pages.text: $(li)The Wither is a very dangerous creature $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_wither)composed of a lot of lost souls and three skull heads$(/l).$(br)$(li)When summoned, this creature will be invunerable for 11 seconds.$(br)$(li)After that it will produce an explosion destroying nearby blocks and inflicting a lot of damage to nearby creatures.

$(li)After that, it will start to throw you wither skulls projectiles that makes you damage and inflicts you the wither effect.$(br)$(li)This effect inflicts you an extra damage every second.$(br)$(li)This creature slowly regenerates its life over time.$(br)$(li)On death it always drops the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nether_star)Nether Star$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:enders_journey/ender_eyes)Wither Eye$(/l).
